data.comment: The match is underway at Children's Mercy Park.
Kansas City push upfield but Drew Fischer quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 9, Ball safe as Colorado is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Colorado needs to be cautious. Kansas City have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Colorado in their own half.
In the minute 10, Drew Fischer awards Colorado a goal kick.
In Kansas City a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Amadou Dia for Kansas City has been booked by Drew Fischer and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 12, Drew Fischer waits before resuming play because Younes Namli for Colorado is still down.
Drew Fischer signals a free kick to Kansas City in their own half.
Colorado awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 15, Throw-in for Colorado at Children's Mercy Park.
Kansas City's Alan Pulido gets in a shot on goal at Children's Mercy Park. But the effort is unsuccessful.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kansas City.
In the minute 19, Free kick for Colorado in their own half.
Kansas City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Drew Fischer signals a throw-in for Colorado, close to Kansas City's area.
In the minute 20, Important block from the Colorado defence as Gianluca Busio fires in a strike for Kansas City.
In Kansas City Kansas City drive forward through Roger Espinoza. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Drew Fischer awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 22, Throw-in Kansas City.
Younes Namli is back on his feet again.
In the minute 23, Can Kansas City capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Colorado's Collen Warner has been booked in Kansas City.
Johnny Russell gets his shot on target but fails to score for Kansas City.
Goal kick for Colorado at Children's Mercy Park.
In the minute 24, Can Kansas City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Colorado's half?
Kansas City are caught offside.
In the minute 28, Colorado are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Nicolas Mezquida is on a sub for Collen Warner for Colorado.
Alan Pulido for Kansas City drives towards goal at Children's Mercy Park. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Kansas City.
In the minute 34, Colorado have a goal kick.
Kansas City have been awarded a corner by Drew Fischer.
Drew Fischer signals a free kick to Colorado in their own half.
In the minute 37, Drew Fischer signals a free kick to Kansas City.
Throw-in for Kansas City in the half of Colorado.
Throw-in Colorado.
In the minute 39, Drew Fischer signals a Kansas City throw-in in Colorado's half.
Colorado awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Kansas City to take a throw-in in Colorado territory.
In the minute 39, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Kansas City are in shooting range from this free kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Colorado goal kick.
In the minute 41, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Colorado is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Kansas City.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Colorado in their own half.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Kansas City.
In the minute 45, Johnny Russell has recovered and rejoins the match in Kansas City.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Johnny Russell for Kansas City who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
The second-half is underway at Children's Mercy Park.
Colorado awarded a free kick in their own half.
Drew Fischer signals a free kick to Kansas City just outside Colorado's area.
In the minute 47, Lalas Abubakar (Colorado) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 49, Alan Pulido for Kansas City drives towards goal at Children's Mercy Park. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Kansas City have been awarded a corner by Drew Fischer.
Corner awarded to Kansas City.
In the minute 49, Roger Espinoza gets his shot on target but fails to score for Kansas City.
Free kick Kansas City.
Throw-in for Kansas City in their own half.
In the minute 52, Colorado have a goal kick.
Kansas City's Alan Pulido gets in a shot on goal at Children's Mercy Park. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Kansas City in their own half.
In the minute 54, Goal! Alan Pulido gives Kansas City a 1-0 lead.
That's a fine assist from Roger Espinoza.
Drew Fischer signals a Colorado throw-in in Kansas City's half.
In the minute 57, Colorado to take a throw-in in Kansas City territory.
Ball goes out of play for a Kansas City goal kick.
Drew Fischer awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 59, In Kansas City, Colorado push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Drew Fischer signals a free kick to Colorado in their own half.
Throw-in for Kansas City at Children's Mercy Park.
In the minute 61, Throw-in for Colorado in the half of Kansas City.
Throw-in for Colorado in their own half.
In Kansas City Kansas City drive forward through Alan Pulido. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Kansas City have been awarded a corner by Drew Fischer.
Can Kansas City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Colorado's half?
In the minute 66, Free kick for Kansas City in the half of Colorado.
In the minute 66, Robin Fraser is making the team's second substitution at Children's Mercy Park with Nicolas Benezet replacing Andre Shinyashiki.
Kansas City take a comfortable 2-0 lead thanks to Andreu Fontas.
Kansas City have been awarded a corner by Drew Fischer.
Corner awarded to Kansas City.
In the minute 70, The home team replace Gianluca Busio with Khiry Shelton.
Kansas City push forward at Children's Mercy Park and Amadou Dia gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Colorado defence.
In the minute 73, Drew Fischer awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Colorado in the half of Kansas City.
Khiry Shelton (Kansas City) has received a yellow card from Drew Fischer.
In the minute 75, Jonathan Lewis is replacing Younes Namli for the away team.
Auston Trusty is replacing Lalas Abubakar for Colorado at Children's Mercy Park.
The away team have replaced Keegan Rosenberry with Jeremy Kelly. This is the fourth substitution made today by Robin Fraser.
In the minute 76, Drew Fischer signals a Kansas City throw-in in Colorado's half.
Colorado awarded a free kick in their own half.
Colorado awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 81, Peter Vermes (Kansas City) is making a second substitution, with Felipe Hernandez replacing Roger Espinoza.
Colorado's Diego Rubio gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Kansas City defender.
Colorado have been awarded a corner by Drew Fischer.
In the minute 82, Colorado's Jonathan Lewis misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kansas City.
Kansas City make their third substitution with Erik Hurtado replacing Alan Pulido.
In the minute 83, Kansas City to take a throw-in in Colorado territory.
Free kick for Colorado in their own half.
Throw-in for Kansas City at Children's Mercy Park.
In the minute 85, Throw-in Colorado.
In Kansas City a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Jaylin Lindsey is booked for the home team.
In the minute 86, Colorado are pushing forward but Jonathan Lewis's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Kansas City at Children's Mercy Park.
In the minute 88, In Kansas City, Gadi Kinda of Kansas City is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Gadi Kinda puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 3-0.
At Children's Mercy Park, Colorado are penalized for being offside.
Drew Fischer will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Can Colorado get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kansas City's half?
The match has come to a close in Kansas City. The final score is 4-0.
Kansas City make their fourth substitution with Cameron Duke replacing Gadi Kinda.
The home team replace Johnny Russell with Gerso Fernandes.
Goal! Gerso Fernandes extends Kansas City's lead to 4-0.
